title: Colic Calm Homeopathic Gripe Water Oral Suspension
description: Shop Homeopathic Gripe Water Oral Suspension and read reviews at Walgreens. Pickup & Same Day Delivery available on most store items.
cleaned_text: Suspension2.0oz Online and store prices may vary. How would you like to receive this item ? Description - Relieves symptoms of gas and colic - For upset stomach, bloating, and hiccups - Safe and gentle - Homeopathic medicine - Great tasting - Pure and natural - Safe and gentle - Fact acting - Even treats hiccups - 24-48 doses - Non-habit forming - Pediatrician recommended Millions of children around the world take homeopathic medicines as recommended by their health care practitioners. Symptom relief is achieved by stimulation of the body's self-healing properties. Does not contain: Sugar, sodium bicarbonate (baking soda), simethicone, wheat, gluten, soy, dairy, animal products, artificial flavors or colors. - Temporarily relieves the symptoms of: - Gas - Colic - Upset stomach - Bloating - Hiccups Made in USA 877-321-CALM - Under 20 lbs. - 1/4 teaspoon (1.25 mL) - Over 20 lbs. - 1/2 teaspoon (2.5 mL) - Shake well before use to obtain uniform dark mixture - Remove outer seal imprinted with Colic Calm logo from bottle and protective wrap on oral dispenser - When symptoms occur, fill enclosed oral dispenser up to indicated dose level and dispense liquid slowly into mouth, between cheek and gums - If needed, repeat every 30 minutes for up to 3 doses, or as directed by a physician. Do not exceed 6 full doses in 24 hours - Recap bottle and clean oral dispenser - Please note: Sleep may follow naturally after relief - Store at room temperature out of direct sunlight [Show More](javascript:void(0)) Product Specifications IngredientsActive Ingredients: Aloe Socotrina - 5 X (Gas Relief, Bloating), Carbo Vegetabilis - 1 X (Gas Relief, Upset Stomach), Carum Carvi - 5 X (Digestive Aid), Chamomilla - 5 X (Irritability, Hiccups), Foeniculum Vulgare - 5 X (Gas - 5 X (Irritability, Restlessness), Mentha Piperita - 5 X (Bloating, Colic), - 5 X (Upset Stomach, X Water, Sorbic Acid, Xylitol Warnings - Do not use if outer seal imprinted with Colic Calm logo on bottle or protective wrap on oral dispenser are broken or missing - Stop use and consult a doctor if symptoms last more than 7 days or inflammation, fever or infection occurs - As with all medications, it is important to ensure that your child's medical professional is aware of the use of this product - Because product is black, a temporary, harmless, darkening of the stool may occur - May stain fabric; protect clothing and furniture Shipping Specifications Not eligible for Ship to Store at this time This product cannot be shipped to the following state(s): - AA - AE - AK - AP - AS - GU - HI - MP - PR - VI Shipping Weight (in lbs): 0.17 Product in inches (LxWxH): 1.5x 2.5x 4.0 [See Ship to store FAQs](/topic/help/shophelp/shipping_help_main.jsp) Reviews Reviews for Colic Calm Homeopathic Gripe Water Oral SuspensionLoading reviews [Show more](javascript:void(0)) Reviews for Colic Calm
